pages.text: Lycanthropy is a ferocious disease that scars the mind, the body, and the soul. Under a full moon, its victims transform into Werewolves craving fresh meat.$(br2)While physically strong, Silver will harm them, as will Aconite. Werewolves also exclusively feed on meat, no matter their form.

Their weakness to Silver also implies an inability to hold tools such as an Athame for too long.$(br2)Lycanthropy is contracted from another Werewolf - as long as it's not a newly infected lycanthrope - while under the curse of Susceptibility; you must still somehow survive though.$(br2)That sounds like a wonderful idea!
